message:
I'm getting this error:
ep.io: Timeout waiting for service responses for postgres
Have tested on two separate projects. epio upload seems to work fine until I add:
[services]
postgres = true
This only seems to effect new projects. I was able to epio upload fine on an existing project (though changes did not seem to be taking - so I deleted it, thinking i'd just re-upload it - you know, turn it off and on again).
Yes, sorry about that - the postgres database allocator had frozen. Things should be flowing smoothly again now.
